title: The Big Man Himself-All or Nothing (2007)
description:
The Big Man Himself&#039;s sophomore album.
From

"The Big Man Himself was formed in the winter of 2004. With their catchy tunes and their skanking beats, this band has been recognized for bringing out huge crowds and rockin the stage. Released in mid-fall, The Big Man Himself EP, titled "Packin&#039; The Heat", has been a huge hit, providing fresh and melodic rhythms for unsuspecting victims. Since then The Big Man Himself have released a brand new merch line and have sold many units of clothing and have SOLD OUT of "Packin&#039; The Heat" EP&#039;s. The Big Man Himself is now working with Sam Guaiana from the Pettit Project in the new PARAGON STUDIOS. Working on different, new styles, mixing reggae, ska, pop & punk, The Big Man Himself released their full length album "All or Nothing" by October 2007, including some re-done crowd favourites such as, "Nothing To Do" and "Ska radio", but also adding in a mix of new material never heard at shows before."

This is a Ska band from the Caledon area that has been touring with such bands as Ill Scarlett, Keepin 6, and Corporatation. The band has a massive following in the Caledon area. They have a whole horn section and their ska rockin beat will have you jammin all night.
